lead_paragraph: A regulatory commission issued the order after recent earthquakes.

headline.print_headline: Oklahoma: Well Operators Ordered to Reduce Wastewater
headline.main: Oklahoma: Well Operators Ordered to Reduce Wastewater

snippet: A regulatory commission issued the order after recent earthquakes.
abstract: Oklahoma Corporation Commission issues order to well operators at five wastewater injection wells near Edmond, Okla, to reduce wastewater disposal volumes following earthquake activity.
